title: Contact the Tribunal
h1: Contact the tribunal about your case

landing_text.p1: Use the appropriate form to communicate with the tribunal.
landing_text.p2: These requests and applications will be reviewed by the tribunal and copied to the respondent who will have an opportunity to respond.
landing_text.p3: You may be able to request that some details do not get shared with the respondent.

withdraw.caption: Withdraw my claim
withdraw.label: Give notice that I want to withdraw all or part of my claim
withdraw.body: When you've reached a settlement or do not want to continue with your claim.

change-details.caption: Change my personal details
change-details.label: I want to change my personal details
change-details.body: Change the personal details you gave when making your claim.

postpone.caption: Postpone a hearing
postpone.label: Apply to postpone my hearing
postpone.body: Ask the tribunal to postpone your hearing to a later date.

vary.caption: Vary or revoke an order
vary.label: Apply to vary or revoke an order
vary.body: Apply to vary or revoke an order the tribunal has issued. For example, you may need more time to submit something or want to change the number of pages in your hearing documents,

reconsider-decision.caption: Consider a decision afresh
reconsider-decision.label: Apply to have a decision considered afresh
reconsider-decision.body: If you disagree with a judgement or order made by a legal officer in your case you can ask an employment judge to look at that decision again.

amend.caption: Amend my claim
amend.label: Apply to amend my claim
amend.body: Request to amend your ET1 claim - including adding or removing claims or details of your claim.

respondent.caption: Order the respondent
respondent.label: Order the respondent to do something
respondent.body: Apply to order the respondent to do or provide something.

witness.caption: Order a witness to attend
witness.label: Order a witness to attend to give evidence
witness.body: Apply to order a witness to attend to give evidence in your case.

non-compliance.caption: Tell the tribunal the respondent has not complied
non-compliance.label: Tell the tribunal the respondent has not complied with an order
non-compliance.body: Tell us that the respondent has not complied with all or part of an order from the tribunal.

publicity.caption: Restrict publicity
publicity.label: Apply to restrict publicity
publicity.body: Apply to prevent or restrict publicity in your case. The tribunal may conduct hearings in private or anonymise specific parties and witnesses if necessary.

strike.caption: Strike out the response
strike.label: Strike out all or part of the response
strike.body: You can request that the tribunal strike out all or parts of the respondent's response.

reconsider-judgement.caption: Reconsider a judgment
reconsider-judgement.label: Apply for a judgment to be reconsidered
reconsider-judgement.body: Ask to have a judgement made by a judge reconsidered.

other.caption: Contact the tribunal
other.label: Contact the tribunal about something else
other.body: Tell or ask the tribunal about something relevant to your case, and which is not covered by the other options on this page.

documents.label: Submit documents for a hearing
documents.body: Use this form if youâ€™ve been ordered by the tribunal to provide documents for a hearing. This could be all documents including witness statements or supplementary documents.

call.h1: Call the Employment Tribunal customer contact centre
call.p1: Call if you have any questions about your claim. They cannot give you legal advice or process any updates to your case.
call.p2: Use the contact forms to make a request or to provide something for the tribunal.
call.p5: The centre does not open on bank holidays.
